tool_description: Projects future labor costs based on current compensation data, proposed changes, inflation rates, and various economic scenarios for multi-year budget planning.

base_labor_cost.description: Current annual labor cost baseline in dollars

projection_years.description: Number of years to project forward (1-10)

workforce_growth_rate.description: Expected annual workforce growth percentage (-10 to 25)

benefits_inflation_rate.description: Annual benefits cost inflation rate percentage

one_time_costs.description: One-time costs by year (array length should match projection_years)

error_messages: Invalid base cost: Base labor cost must be a positive number greater than zero.
Invalid projection period: Projection years must be between 1 and 10.
Invalid wage increase: Annual wage increase must be between 0 and 20 percent.
Invalid inflation rate: Inflation rate must be between 0 and 15 percent.
Invalid workforce growth: Workforce growth rate must be between -10 and 25 percent.
Invalid benefits inflation: Benefits inflation rate must be between 0 and 20 percent.
Invalid economic scenario: Economic scenario must be one of: optimistic, baseline, pessimistic.
Invalid productivity factor: Productivity factor must be between -5 and 15 percent.
One-time costs mismatch: One-time costs array length must match projection_years if provided.
usage: Provide base_labor_cost, projection_years, wage increases, inflation rates, and workforce growth. Optionally specify benefits_inflation_rate, one_time_costs, economic_scenario, productivity_factor, and contract_provisions for detailed projections.

projected_costs_by_year.description: Annual projected labor costs for each year

total_cost_increase.description: Total percentage increase over projection period

cumulative_cost.description: Cumulative labor costs over entire projection period

cost_breakdown_by_category.description: Breakdown of costs by wages, benefits, and other categories
